docna.cdata!:
Uruguay - Private Sector Development Project
            : Loan 3698 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Uruguay - Private Sector
            Development Project : Loan 3698 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

18218515.theme: Other financial and private sector development

abstracts.cdata!:
The general objectives of the project
            are to help increase production of goods and services that
            generate foreign exchange revenues and enhance the
            efficiency of the productive and financial sectors.
            Increased production and allocative efficiency would be
            achieved by timely provision of term financing to enable the
            private sector to take advantage of the liberalized trade
            regime. Increased efficiency of the financial sector would
            be achieved through the development by the Central Bank of
            Uruguay of norms to regulate and supervise medium and
            long-term credit operations and through the project's
            technical assistance that would address some of the
            regulatory constraints to credit access in Uruguay. The
            operation has two components: (a) a line of credit to
            finance private investment, associated permanent working
            capital and leasing operations -- excluding purchase of land
            and housing -- of viable enterprises that have revenues
            predominantly in US dollars; and (b) a technical assistance
            component to finance studies aimed at improving regulations
            on the use of movable assets as collateral, computerization
            of the cattle registry; and the securitization of mortgage loans.
